materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Old Harbour in Singapore from a high view point. The foreground of the photograph shows the roofs of numerous buildings by the harbour. There are several ships by the harbour in the background of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Old Harbour, Singapore
subject_terms_1: aerial views harbors coastal settlements port settlements
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Singapore Aerial views Harbors coastal settlements
